attributes.review: I decided to download this app as i felt it would be a great way to contribute to Trump’s campaign. But it has come to my attention  that when i installed they app, my microwave stopped working! It completely shut down and to make it worst, it started HARASSING me!!! It said horrible things like “ i will burn your food” and “i hate you” and to add, my microwave said that that the reason it was acting up was because i downloaded this app! Save your time people!! DONT download this app
attributes.title: THE WORST APP✨

attributes.review: this app is a waste of space. i have no idea why anyone would get it. the day i downloaded it i had so much bad luck. first off a tree fell on my car and my dog committed arson. all because i downloaded this app. it’s not worth the trouble to have to put your phone in the freezer after opening the app because it takes up so much space that your phone heats up really fast. this app isn’t even fun, like i don’t enjoy using it so what’s the point of even getting it. in conclusion if you or a loved one is considering getting this app, don’t it’s a wast of time in your life that you’ll never get back. instead of using all of that time on this pointless app you should go read a book, or even better go to therapy
attributes.title: worst app ever😡😡

attributes.review: Hey hey I just got your message I’m sorry I’m gonna is your address so I’m going back home is the time of that time so I’m sorry I cannot is it I was going on my birthday so I wanna go hang out tonight haha was the time I was like hey I wanna see y’all in my bed I was like hey I’m sorry I’m so busy I just want to say hey hey I’m good I’m just leaving now I’m leaving in a few minutes I’m so sorry to go to hang with you guys I wanna is a good day I’m going back home was that the same way you said you wanna go hang up and I don’t
attributes.title: Yes

attributes.review: Many of my friends told me how much fun they were having on the app so I thought I’d give it a go, unfortunately, I did not have a good time. As soon as I opened the app I heard my doorbell ring. I got up to see it was actually JK Rowling (author of nothing) congratulating me on my decision to become transphobic!! She must have gotten my information from this app as it seems rather tied to the subject matter. This app should be deleted as I don’t want my information stolen.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I don’t know why I got it on my phone it took up a lot of space and I need to make room for photos. The content in the app was miss leading as well and a waste of time. If I could give negative stars I would. NEGATIVE STARS
attributes.title: Waste of space on my phone

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to get valuable information about the political climate in America! Instead it was just a live feed of an obese hog covered in spray tan, throwing a tantrum! After looking around the app more, I found out that that the hog was in fact, our President. This deeply saddened me. I hated knowing that this disgraceful overused bottle of spray tan was ruining our country. it would be better if he were an actual hog, because I can forgive a pig, but not this man.
attributes.title: I am shocked this is allowed on the App Store

attributes.review: I can’t believe i wasted 10 DOLLARS on this app. I was once a devout trump supporter and i would donate HALF my paycheck to his campaign. But after seeing how this app started PULLING $10 A WEEK FROM MY BANK ACCOUNT without ASKING!? Terrible! Gonna be changing my vote to SLEEPY JOE after seeing how POORLY MADE this app is. What a waste of money. The sound that this app emits makes my dog BARK NONSTOP! I had to start feeding my puppy barron cat litter to get it to calm down. I wish i could rate it zero stars!! Boohoo donald rump!
attributes.title: If i could give this app zero stars i WOULD

attributes.review: This app has traumatized me and I will never suggest it to anyone again👺👽I am a fine christian mother of three and this app has made one of my lovely beings dismember themselves and play with their limbs like barbie dolls😹💅🏾😎 my daughter is having nightmares of this man who quite frankly looks like a cheeto every night👄🦍 i👁 do😂 not🤗 stand👺 by✨ this😡 the cheeto man even claims he is president which i find OBSURD🤡🤮✨😹 silly man and with that being said i wish you a goodnight manny america black and yellow for the win🤩💅🏾😹✨❤️
attributes.title: Karen😹 Smith🤩✨

attributes.review:
It should be considered domestic terrorism to have this app in existence today. Especially since the ‘man’ in the poster is best described as a dyslexic tangerine with no sense of direction and no sense of the English language which is the only language of communication for him other than his tiny hands.
Let people rest, 2020 has been harsh enough already without a Chito puff with the mental brain power of a toddler telling us what to do.
Have a wonderful rest of your day and remember #BLM 😘✨
attributes.title: Let Us Rest

attributes.review: This app is so annoying and scary and disgusting it should be TAKEN DOWN it makes my iPhone glitch so many times and there’s a lot of notifications on this app it’s giving me a headache and there was a scary orange dude who was just everywhere it was so DISGUSTING I have no good words for this app it just everything is horrible scary disgusting and the worst thing about this app is the orange dude he’s gonna give me nightmares but anyways this app should be taken down and never come back.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
